'''Dan Greer''' is a captain with the [[Seattle Fire Department]].

==History==
Greer attended a meeting between the fire union and the mayoral candidates. [[Michael Dixon]] attended the meeting, but [[Travis Montgomery]] missed it due to his work. After the meeting was over, Greer was talking to Dixon as the room was cleaned up when Travis came in. Travis started talking to who he thought were union members only to find out they were just cleaning up. Then he told Greer that none of what was being said about him was true. Greer said he believed that, but that's why coming to the meeting was so important.

==Career==
He is a captain for the [[Seattle Fire Department]].
